TutorialÂ¶

  1. Clone our Github repository https://github.com/MSDS698/2020-product-analytics-group-project-indigo

  2. Create a virtual environment with $ python -m venv ENV_NAME

  3. Activate the environment with $ source ENV_NAME/bin/activate

  4. Install the required packages with $ pip install -r requirements.txt

  5. Run our application with $ python application.py
